Generation VIII.Sword: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.
Generation VIII.Shield: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It gets berries to eat by shooting them down with bullets of water it spurts from its mouth. Its aim is perfect.
Generation IX.Violet: It’s a very cautious Pokémon. When it has no choice but to battle, it hides itself before attacking.

Generation VIII.Sword: First partner Pokémon from Leon in Postwick
Generation VIII.Shield: First partner Pokémon from Leon in Postwick

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Savanna Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Savanna Biome)
